visualization_prompt: Generate a stacked percentage bar chart showing nutritional composition of honey using categorical data labels and grayscale color encoding
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains one-dimensional compositional data with five categorical variables representing honey components. Values are percentage measurements summing to 100±0.1% tolerance. Source data from Wikipedia demonstrates high reliability through citation of peer-reviewed studies. The stacked percentage bar chart effectively communicates part-to-whole relationships while minimizing non-data ink through axis removal. Grayscale encoding follows Cairo's luminance contrast principles for categorical discrimination. Data labels provide exact values while maintaining Tufte's data density principle. Composition percentages (μ=20, σ=14.5) show exponential distribution typical of natural product formulations.
